title: Dialogue-Based Foreign Language and Culture Integrated Pedagogy: Blended Learning Application

context.prior_knowledge: Basic foreign language communication skills and digital device usage experience
context.additional_context: Includes cross-cultural communication simulation activities using mathematical problem-solving processes.

learning_goals: Learners can sustain a 5-minute or longer conversation in the target language on daily life topics (e.g., calculation, measurement).
Learners can analyze problem-solving approaches to math questions in another culture and explain three or more cultural differences.
Learners can create and share cultural comparison project outcomes using digital collaboration tools (e.g., Padlet).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
